author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [Microsoft.ApplicationInsights](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet) from 2.7.2 to 2.8.0.
Release notes *Sourced from [Microsoft.ApplicationInsights's releases](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/releases).* > ## 2.8.0 (2.8.0.20008) > - [New API to store/retrieve any raw objects on TelemetryContext to enable AutoCollectors to pass additional information for use by TelemetryInitializers.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/937) > - Perf Improvements > https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/927 > https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/930 > https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/934 > - Fix: [Response code shouldn't be overwritten to 200 if not set](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/918) > > > ## 2.8.0-beta2 (2.8.0.12856) > - [TelemetryProcessors (sampling, autocollectedmetricaggregator), TelemetryChannel (ServerTelemetryChannel) added automatically to the default ApplicationInsights.config are moved under the default telemetry sink.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/907) > If you are upgrading, and have added/modified TelemetryProcessors/TelemetryChannel, make sure to copy them to the default sink section. > > > ## 2.8.0-beta1 (2.8.0.3901) > - [Add a new distict properties collection, GlobalProperties, on TelemetryContext, and obsolete the Properties on TelemetryContext.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/820) > - [Added support for strongly typed extensibility for Telemetry types using IExtension.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/871) > - [New method SerializeData(ISerializationWriter writer) defined in ITelemetry. All existing types implement this method to emit information about it's fields to channels who can serialize this data] > (continuation of https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/871) > - [Allow to track PageViewPerformance data type](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/673). > - Added method `ExceptionDetailsInfoList` on `ExceptionTelemetry` class that gives control to user to update exception > message and exception type of underlying `System.Exception` object that user wants to send to telemetry. Related discussion is [here](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/498). > - Added an option of creating ExceptionTelemetry object off of custom exception information rather than a System.Exception object. > - [Add support for hex values in config](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/551) >
Changelog *Sourced from [Microsoft.ApplicationInsights's changelog](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md).* > ## Version 2.8.0 > - [New API to store/retrieve any raw objects on TelemetryContext to enable AutoCollectors to pass additional information for use by TelemetryInitializers.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/937) > - Perf Improvements > https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/927 > https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/930 > https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/934 > - Fix: [Response code shouldn't be overwritten to 200 if not set](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/918) > > ## Version 2.8.0-beta2 > - [TelemetryProcessors (sampling, autocollectedmetricaggregator), TelemetryChannel (ServerTelemetryChannel) added automatically to the default ApplicationInsights.config are moved under the default telemetry sink.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/907) > If you are upgrading, and have added/modified TelemetryProcessors/TelemetryChannel, make sure to copy them to the default sink section. > > ## Version 2.8.0-beta1 > - [Add a new distict properties collection, GlobalProperties, on TelemetryContext, and obsolete the Properties on TelemetryContext.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/820) > - [Added support for strongly typed extensibility for Telemetry types using IExtension.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/871) > - [New method SerializeData(ISerializationWriter writer) defined in ITelemetry. All existing types implement this method to emit information about it's fields to channels who can serialize this data] > (continuation of https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/871) > - [Allow to track PageViewPerformance data type](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/673). > - Added method `ExceptionDetailsInfoList` on `ExceptionTelemetry` class that gives control to user to update exception > message and exception type of underlying `System.Exception` object that user wants to send to telemetry. Related discussion is [here](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/498). > - Added an option of creating ExceptionTelemetry object off of custom exception information rather than a System.Exception object. > - [Add support for hex values in config](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/551)
Commits - [`ca969ec`](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/ca969ecc3e846cfd3a36cb369a166a6a06d4f31f) Merge pull request [#946](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/946) from Microsoft/merge_develop_to_master(prep_2.8) - [`9ccfcd0`](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/9ccfcd06dddd28501146321c976bb3b03f14571e) Merge branch 'develop' into merge_develop_to_master(prep_2.8) - [`2b7e11c`](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/2b7e11ca34b72610fdfe72a11e05cefddf428cd8) Bump version 2.8.0 ([#943](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/943)) - [`24cf0ba`](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/24cf0ba19a30d29d462805b52da73dcde86dac71) Merge pull request [#942](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/942) from Microsoft/cithomas/lazydictcontinued - [`9f5d6e5`](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/9f5d6e5c813b71f5b019fd614892da012013b2b5) Avoid unnecessary dictionary instantiation. continuing from previous PR - [`d320df8`](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/d320df809842f43a7e2f1ce7ebddc13e1912be86) add script to audit nupkg during build ([#938](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/938)) - [`2f390e0`](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/2f390e0328a341dae179ca8db4c0d56d3ff820ad) Merge pull request [#939](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/939) from Microsoft/cithomas/stateintelemetrycontext - [`0b380c5`](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/0b380c59770e2148cd0e83f77cf3482d5040691d) Changelog updated - [`251e070`](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/251e0702b13b3b20f0cc9624157b9143cb58d325) tc null checks tests - [`ea9190c`](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/ea9190c1c03798a42e7af2415ec8ed57bedfcacf) Tests for TC rawobject store modifiedto use AreSame instead of AreEqual - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/compare/2.7.2...2.8.0)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=Microsoft.ApplicationInsights&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.7.2&new-version=2.8.0)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=Microsoft.ApplicationInsights&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.7.2&new-version=2.8.0) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot use these labels` will set the current labels as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these reviewers` will set the current reviewers as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these assignees` will set the current assignees as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use this milestone` will set the current milestone as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in your Dependabot [dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com): - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.
title: Bump Microsoft.ApplicationInsights from 2.7.2 to 2.8.0
